content.description: Climb the overhang up to a huge ledge then climb up the face on the left.
content.protection: This route can be TR’d with large pro, #3-5 cams
content.location: Back side of boulder. Route on the right starting under the small overhang.

content.description:
Climb up and right on an easy skirt below a crack. Good finger jam or side pull in the crack for your left hand. Climb to the ledge above and traverse right two steps. Climb the face above through the crux section.

This route can be top roped if you build your own anchor. No bolts. Large cams for anchor #2-4
content.protection: #2-4 Cams for a top rope anchor
content.location: Back side of boulder starting on the far left corner. Walk around to the right and down the hillside to the back of the boulder.

content.description: Start with the right hand jam up to the ledge. Hook in above the bulge and walk your feet up.
content.location: Just to the right of Eye In The Sky on the back side.
Just to the right of the down climb on the front of the boulder.

content.description: Perfect granite. This problem starts on two crimp side pulls, the left hand around a quarter pad on the face, and the right hand along the arete with about a half pad. From there gain feet and reach up left for the slopers. Move left to the jug and top out.
content.location:
The Blackwood Boulder is located approximately 1/2 mile down the road from the Nordic base laying 30 ft to the right of the road, you can’t miss it. There is a turn out with plenty of parking and wide open space.

Lat 34.8034 Long -119.1235

content.description: The Crux is about mid route. But a fairly easy warm up route.
content.location: Just to the left of Blabe Rock

content.description: Stem up to the wide slanting crack and work your feet up to the right on good holds. Continue up the dihedral with good hand jams for your left hand.
content.protection: This route can be TR’d with large protection, #3-5 cams
content.location: The center route on the back of the boulder up the dihedral.

climbs.name: Half Way Down On The Left

content.description: Climb to match feet on the little triangle shaped ledge. The crux is about 6 feet up. Head right toward the edge the angles up and right.
content.location: just to the left of Illustrative Life. Good for beginners.

content.description: Starting on the right side of the chimney climb the face up the right on good holds.
Stemming up an obvious chimney on the right side of the formation.
content.location: Just to the right of Boulder Shoulder on the right side of the rock.

content.description: Walk around to the right and start on the dirt. Climb up to an awkward ledge and a few more moves up the face above.
content.location: The first route on the right side of the formation. Just right of Short Stack.

content.description: Nice and easy climb on clean rock!
content.location: Located to the left of the down climb, next to the tree.
